text: Gonzalo Iván Largo Romero (born August 1, 1977 in Madrid) is a 5-per-team football player from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind. He played 5-per- team football at the 2004 Summer Paralympics. His team finished third after they played Greece and, won 2-0. == References == Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Footballers from Madrid Category:Spanish 5-per-team footballers
title: Gonzalo Iván Largo Romero
